content.rendered: Brilliant Lawyer and Law firm! I have been consulting them on numerous issues since September 2018 and they are also fighting some RERA cases for me. For everything I have got honest advice, if there’s a case that’s going to be lengthy I am informed in advance and other intricacies are also dealt with, which enables me in better decision making. Highly recommended.
